data.content:
noun
plural -sions
[count] a medical :a sudden violent shaking of the muscles in your body that you are unable to control - usually plural
The patient suffers from convulsions.
He suddenly went into convulsions.
a sudden experience of something (such as laughter) that shakes or moves your body - usually plural
The joke sent the audience into convulsions of laughter.
a sudden change or disturbance that affects a country, organization, etc. - usually plural
an era of political convulsions [=upheavals]
The controversial exhibit caused convulsions in the artistic community.

Danh từ
(thường số nhiều) cơn co giật (cơ bắp)
the child reacted to the drug by going into convulsions
đứa bé co giật do phản ứng thuốc
sự rung cuyển, sự náo loạn
the leader's assassination led to political convulsions
sự ám sát lãnh tụ đã dẫn đến những sự náo lọan về chính trị
